Chichewa-English.English: Where can I find beans at cheap price?
Whats the price of maize now?

Chichewa-English.Chichewa: Ku Dowa chimanga chili pa bwanji?
Chichewa-English.English: Whats the price of maize in Dowa?

Chichewa-English.Chichewa: Kodi ndi boma liti anakolola chimanga chambiri pakati pa Lilongwe kapena Kasungu?
Chichewa-English.English: Which district produced more maize: Lilongwe or Kasungu?

Chichewa-English.Chichewa: Kodi chimanga chili pa bwanji ku Rumphi?
Chichewa-English.English: How much is maize per Kg in Rumphi?

Chichewa-English.Chichewa: Mpunga ukugulitsidwa ndalama zingati ku Lilongwe?
Chichewa-English.English: Whats the price of rice in Lilongwe?
Which district has the cheap price for groundnuts?

Chichewa-English.Chichewa: Ndi boma liti komwe anakolola chimanga chambiri?
Chichewa-English.English: Which district harvested large quantities of maize?

Chichewa-English.Chichewa: Ndi mbeu zanji anakolola bwino ku Rumphi?
Chichewa-English.English: Which crops produced the most yields in Rumphi?
Where can I find groundnuts at reasonable price?
How much is rice per Kg?

English-Chichewa.English: Where can I find cheap maize
Which district is hit the worst by hunger and lack of food?
English-Chichewa.Chichewa: Ndi boma liti koma njala yabvuta kwambiri
Ndi boma liti lomwe chimanga chikudula kwambiri

English-Chichewa.English: The districts with the most maize are
English-Chichewa.Chichewa: Ma boma amene anakolola chimanga chambiri ndi awa

English-Chichewa.English: Lilongwe with a total yield of 444,440
English-Chichewa.Chichewa: Ku Lilongwe kumene anakolola chimanga chokwana 444,440

English-Chichewa.English: Lilongwe with a total yield of 444,440 tonnes
English-Chichewa.Chichewa: Ku Lilongwe kumene anakolola chimanga chokwana 444,440 tonnes

English-Chichewa.English: The current food security situation in Balaka is anticipated to be challenging, with 45 percent of the population affected by acute food insecurity.
English-Chichewa.Chichewa: Mabvuto azakudya akula kwambiri mboma la Balaka, komwe anthu okwanira 45 percent alibe chakudya chokwana

English-Chichewa.English: You can find maize in Lilongwe, Kasungu, Dowa, Mzimba, and Mchinji
English-Chichewa.Chichewa: Chimanga chikupezeka kumaboma awa  Lilongwe, Kasungu, Dowa, Mzimba, ndi Mchinji
